color.$description: The color palette for the application

slate-1000_66.$description: A semi-transparent overlay color for use in modals and popups

primary.$description: The primary background color of the application

primary-intent.$description: The primary background color of the application

primary-active.$description: The primary background color of the application

primary-subtle.$description: The primary subtle background color of the application

primary-inverse.$description: The primary foreground color to stand out on a primary background

primary-emphasis.$description: A bolder primary foreground color to stand out on a primary background

primary-rim.$description: The border color for primary colored elements

accent.$description: The accent background color of the application

accent-intent.$description: The accent background color of the application

accent-active.$description: The accent background color of the application

accent-subtle.$description: The accent subtle background color of the application

accent-inverse.$description: A foreground color to stand out against an accent background

accent-emphasis.$description: A bolder foreground color to stand out against an accent background

accent-rim.$description: The border color for accent colored elements

neutral.$description: A muted background color for designating less important areas of the application

neutral-intent.$description: A muted background color for designating less important areas of the application

neutral-active.$description: A muted background color for designating less important areas of the application

neutral-subtle.$description: A muted subtle background color for designating less important areas of the application

neutral-inverse.$description: A foreground color to stand out against a neutral background

neutral-emphasis.$description: A bolder foreground color to stand out against a neutral background

neutral-rim.$description: The border color for neutral colored elements

critical.$description: The critical background color of the application

critical-intent.$description: The critical background color of the application

critical-active.$description: The critical background color of the application

critical-subtle.$description: The critical subtle background color of the application

critical-inverse.$description: A foreground color to stand out against a critical background

critical-emphasis.$description: A bolder foreground color to stand out against a critical background

critical-rim.$description: The border color for critical colored elements

positive.$description: The success/positive background color of the application

positive-intent.$description: The success/positive background color of the application

positive-active.$description: The success/positive background color of the application

positive-subtle.$description: The success/positive subtle background color of the application

positive-inverse.$description: A foreground color to stand out against a positive background

positive-emphasis.$description: A bolder foreground color to stand out against a positive background

positive-rim.$description: The border color for positive colored elements

warning.$description: The warning background color of the application

warning-intent.$description: The warning background color of the application

warning-active.$description: The warning background color of the application

warning-subtle.$description: The warning subtle background color of the application

warning-inverse.$description: A foreground color to stand out against a warning background

warning-emphasis.$description: A bolder foreground color to stand out against a warning background

warning-rim.$description: The border color for warning colored elements

base.$description: A neutral color to use as a default background

base-intent.$description: A subdued neutral background color for callouts and other section highlights

base-active.$description: A subdued neutral background color for callouts and other section highlights

base-subtle.$description: A subdued neutral background color for callouts and other section highlights

base-emphasis.$description: A bolder neutral color for foreground elements that need to stand out more

base-inverse.$description: A contrasting darker neutral color to use for foreground elements in light mode

base-border.$description: A neutral color to use as a default for borders

base-rim.$description: A neutral color to use as a default for borders

overlay.$description: A backdrop color for use in modals and popups

base.$description: A neutral color to use as a default background in dark mode

base-intent.$description: A subdued neutral background color for callouts and other section highlights

base-active.$description: A subdued neutral background color for callouts and other section highlights

base-subtle.$description: A bolder neutral color for foreground elements that need to stand out more in dark mode

base-emphasis.$description: A bolder neutral color for foreground elements that need to stand out more

base-inverse.$description: A contrasting lighter neutral color to use for foreground elements in dark mode

base-border.$description: A neutral color to use as a default for borders

base-rim.$description: A neutral color to use as a default for borders

overlay.$description: A backdrop color for use in modals and popups

font-weight.$description: On native apps, font weight for custom fonts must be normal. Font weight is build into what ever font-face is being used.
